name: The Simple Project Manager
description: Break your projects down into tasks & sub-tasks. View them in an easy to use dashboard. Simple as that.About this templateThe Simple Project Manager is a stripped back way to manage projects, tasks and sub-tasks using Notion.It is based on the idea that success is achieved in increments. Use this template to break your projects down and watch each task and sub-task you complete automatically add to your project’s progress bar.What’s included in the template?2 related and easy to manage datab
